jobDescription: This client, located in downtown Chicago is looking for an exceptional Senior Data Analyst to take complete ownership over the marketing and sales data for an emerging healthcare organization. They offer a hip start-up atmosphere but the stability and growth of a well-established organization.  The Senior Data Analyst will be a standalone data scientist that embraces the rewarding opportunity of working with C level business users and helping transform data into easily understood, functional information that will help drive the marketing efforts.  This candidate MUST HAVE at least 4 years of experience in data analytics, and at least 2 on a marketing/sales team. Additionally, this Senior Data Analyst must be proficient in a variety of technologies including Excel, PowerPoint, R, and Python. Other preferred technologies include C#, Java, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.  Perks include unlimited PTO, pre-tax commuter benefits, standing desks, healthy breakfast, and a Divvy bike membership. *THIS IS A DIRECT-HIRE OPPORTUNITY AND CANDIDATES MUST BE ABLE TO WORK DIRECTLY ON W2 AS GREEN CARD OR US CITIZEN. SPONSORSHIP IS NOT OFFERED*provided by Dice Senior Data Analyst
